channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 10th June
item.description:
Has been in the same spot for over 25 month but some how it obtains MOT & Tax without moving from the spot. Surely MOT certificate should be given at a testing station??

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelbury Green, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins being used to reserve parking, 10th June
item.description:
The tenants at 27 Oakhurst Road EN3 6QG have put their bins out on the road to reserve a parking space outside their property, which is illegal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakhurst Road, London

item.title: Bin blocking pavement, 10th June
item.description:
This large bin outside the nursery has been blocking half the pavement for many months, making it narrow and unsafe. Especially dangerous as it's by a nursery so many small children will be walking there. It's nerve-racking to walk by here with a buggy or with small children as it's near a very busy road. It's also always open/overflowing and attracting squirrels.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Dulwich Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and contaminated recycling bins, 10th June
item.description:
Fly tipping of furniture and other waste has recommenced outside 2a Combedale Road. This has been an issue for 2-3 weeks. As in late, 2023 when fly tipping was also an issue, contaminated recycling bins are also no longer being collected which encourages other to fly tip. These bins need to be removed to stop this issue and reduce the risk of vermin problems.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Woolwich Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The intercom not working on floor 4, 10th June
item.description:
The intercom is not working, from the outside we cannot ring to come in as the bell doesn't always work and the fob and the exit button also doesn't always work, there is no other way out because the lift is not working. Please see to it ASAP thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Common, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car crash site, 10th June
item.description:

item.title: Empathy, 10th June
item.description:
To book baby death certificate and new born certificates at the same place and the same time? Please be considerate of those mothers who have come to collect certificates for their baby's who have passed away. It's cruel do book it at the same time.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hillman Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
